# About
I am a Turkish software developer. I will put my résumé here when it is done.

## Hobbies & Interests
* Reading. I especially like post-modernist works (mainly absurdism and the Theatre of Absurd), early science fiction and fantasy. My favourite authors are Douglas Adams and Samuel Beckett.
* Solving Project Euler problems.
* Studying linguistics, history and geography leisurely when I have nothing else to do.
* Contributing to FOSS translation projects.
* Listening to music. [Here](http://www.last.fm/user/ErkinBatu) is my Last.FM profile.

## Languages
The only language I am strong with is Haskell. I also know C and Python at a basic level. I try to write all my papers in LaTeX (unless I am short on time).  
As for natural languages; I speak native Turkish, near-native English and near-fluent Japanese.

## Preferences
My text editor of choice is GNU emacs. I use ed in times of emergency.  
My keyboard is a cheap rubber-dome switch keyboard, using Dvorak (which I have modified with extensions for Turkish). I am planning to obtain an ergonomic keyboard with mechanical keyswitches in the future.  
The operating system I use is Arch Linux, using the kernel linux-ck optimised for AMD K10.  
I am using awesome for window manager but I am planning to switch to xmonad.

## Projects
*I have not finished a single serious project. All my projects until now were either silly or incomplete. You can view my GitHub page to view a few of them. This section will be updated.*

## Contact
If you need or want to reach me, my main e-mail address is `b64decode('ZXJraW5iYXR1QGdtYWlsLmNvbQ==')`.  
On IRC, I use the nick `e` on EsperNet and `erkin` on FreeNode.  
My public GPG key can be seen [here](/pubkey.txt).
